unnormalised: Arre yaar, Mrs. Sharma's daughter got married! Heard it was a grand affair. Mr. and Mrs. Verma were also there, looking all decked up. Even 'Kumar bhai' made an appearance, quite the social gathering, no? Wish I could've gone, but work kept me busy. Hopefully, I'll catch up with everyone soon.
normalised: Arre yaar, Missus Sharma's daughter got married! Heard it was a grand affair. Mister and Missus Verma were also there, looking all decked up. Even 'Kumar bhai' made an appearance, quite the social gathering, no? Wish I could've gone, but work kept me busy. Hopefully, I'll catch up with everyone soon.
